annotations.description: Although we're always tempted to find a specific source at a specific time for each cocktail recipe, the reality for many of the classics is that they were e...
annotations.title: Every Martini From History

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Sweet Vermouth
1oz (30ml) Plymouth Gin
1 Dash Gum Syrup
Cherry Garnish

Stir and strain into nick and nora. 
Garnish with maraschino cherry

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zoPm3jZCrnE
title: Sweet Martini
